Lilium

Welcome to Lilium!

Lilium is a simple blog theme for Jekyll

You can add a hook or a description of your blog here.

Manage general information from _config.yml, such as name, contacts, social links, number of posts to be displayed in the homepage (the grid down here).

Access to your whole posts archive by creating a page with the layout: archive and a page with the list of your postsâ€™ categories with the layout: categories. For installation and usage guide see Lilium on GitHub.

About Lilium

Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.
